com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker

Class CircuitBreakerClient<I extends Request,O extends Response>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.client.DecoratingClient<I,O,I,O>
      • com.linecorp.armeria.client.SimpleDecoratingClient<I,O>
        • com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker.CircuitBreakerClient<I,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the Request type
    O - the Response type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client<I,O>

    public final class CircuitBreakerClient<I extends Request,O extends Response>
extends SimpleDecoratingClient<I,O>
    A Client decorator that handles failures of remote invocation based on circuit breaker pattern.

    • Method Detail

      • newDecorator

        public static <I extends Request,O extends Response> Function<Client<I,O>,CircuitBreakerClient<I,O>> newDecorator(CircuitBreaker circuitBreaker)
        Creates a new decorator using the specified CircuitBreaker instance.

        Since CircuitBreaker is a unit of failure detection, Don't reuse the same instance for unrelated services.

        Parameters:
        circuitBreaker - The CircuitBreaker instance to be used

      • newDecorator

        public static <I extends Request,O extends Response> Function<Client<I,O>,CircuitBreakerClient<I,O>> newDecorator(CircuitBreakerMapping mapping)
        Creates a new decorator with the specified CircuitBreakerMapping.

      • newPerMethodDecorator

        public static <I extends Request,O extends Response> Function<Client<I,O>,CircuitBreakerClient<I,O>> newPerMethodDecorator(Function<String,CircuitBreaker> factory)
        Creates a new decorator that binds one CircuitBreaker per method.
        Parameters:
        factory - A function that takes a method name and creates a new CircuitBreaker.

      • newPerHostDecorator

        public static <I extends Request,O extends Response> Function<Client<I,O>,CircuitBreakerClient<I,O>> newPerHostDecorator(Function<String,CircuitBreaker> factory)
        Creates a new decorator that binds one CircuitBreaker per host.
        Parameters:
        factory - A function that takes a host name and creates a new CircuitBreaker.

      • newPerHostAndMethodDecorator

        public static <I extends Request,O extends Response> Function<Client<I,O>,CircuitBreakerClient<I,O>> newPerHostAndMethodDecorator(Function<String,CircuitBreaker> factory)
        Creates a new decorator that binds one CircuitBreaker per host and method.
        Parameters:
        factory - A function that takes a host+method name and creates a new CircuitBreaker.
